authors.author: Judson Van DeVenter Winfield S. Weeden

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Sunlight, sunlight in my soul today! newline Sunlight, sunlight all along the way! newline Since the Savior found me, newline Took away my sin, newline I have had the sunlight of His love within.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I wandered in the shades of night newline Till Jesus came to me, newline And with the sunlight of His love newline Bid all my darkness flee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho clouds may gather in the sky, newline And billows round me roll, newline However dark the world may be, newline I've sunlight in my soul,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: While walking in the light of God, newline I sweet communion find; newline I press with holy vigor on, newline And leave the world behind.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I cross the wide extended fields, newline I journey o'er the plain, newline And in the sunlight of His love newline I reap the golden grain.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Soon I shall see Him as He is, newline The light that came to me; newline Behold the brightness of His face newline Thro'out eternity.
